Harris, the daughter of immigrants, the former attorney general of California, and the only Black woman in the Senate, achieves a number of milestones.
A woman in the White House, after all

No, campaign season isn’t over yet. What kind of president Biden can be depends on what comes next
EDITORIALMr. President, you’re firedThe American people have spoken. Trump must concede the election.

Stacey Abrams wins praise for helping drive Biden’s gains in Georgia If Democrat Joe Biden wins Georgia, political observers say he’ll have one person to thank more than anyone else: former gubernatorial candidate Stacey Abrams.

Here’s what we know about a potential recount in GeorgiaGeorgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger told reporters Friday that the state will likely head to a recount due to the slim vote margin between President Trump and former Vice President Joe Biden.

These are the election memes that kept us sane this weekThey’re on Twitter, TikTok, Instagram, even Facebook. They feature snippets from "Marriage Story,” “The Great British Baking Show,” even "Zootopia." And they helped keep us sane as the election dragged on.

Today’s election far from the court battle waged in 2000′s Bush v. GoreWhile pushing false accusations and conspiracy theories, President Trump’s pledge of a long, drawn-out legal fight over the election has sparked memories of a weekslong court battle over Florida ballots, which ultimately sealed the 2000 presidential election.
Where the election fight is playing out in the courtsHere are the cases currently underway or facing a potential appeal. All of them have been initiated by President Trump, his party or his allies.

Stacey Abrams wins praise for helping drive Biden’s gains in Georgia If Democrat Joe Biden wins Georgia, political observers say he’ll have one person to thank more than anyone else: former gubernatorial candidate Stacey Abrams.

Here’s what we know about a potential recount in GeorgiaGeorgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger told reporters Friday that the state will likely head to a recount due to the slim vote margin between President Trump and former Vice President Joe Biden.

These are the election memes that kept us sane this weekThey’re on Twitter, TikTok, Instagram, even Facebook. They feature snippets from "Marriage Story,” “The Great British Baking Show,” even "Zootopia." And they helped keep us sane as the election dragged on.

Today’s election far from the court battle waged in 2000′s Bush v. GoreWhile pushing false accusations and conspiracy theories, President Trump’s pledge of a long, drawn-out legal fight over the election has sparked memories of a weekslong court battle over Florida ballots, which ultimately sealed the 2000 presidential election.
Where the election fight is playing out in the courtsHere are the cases currently underway or facing a potential appeal. All of them have been initiated by President Trump, his party or his allies.
Western allies congratulate new president-electLeaders of the United States' traditional Western allies are offering their congratulations to the incoming Joe Biden administration.
